channel.title: Comments on: He R Teh Dying Agen

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
<a href="http://www.furl.net/search?search=cache&id=10648263&url=http://forums.worldofwarcraft.com/thread.aspx?fn=wow-realm-norgannon&t=7480" rel="nofollow">Furl archive of thread</a>. Or, for the Furl-challenged, a <a href="http://flickr.com/photo_zoom.gne?id=205140479&size=o" rel="nofollow">screenshot of forum page</a> on Flickr.
I'm a f'ing boyscout when it comes to preparedness.
item.content:encoded:
Furl archive of thread. Or, for the Furl-challenged, a screenshot of forum page on Flickr.

I’m a f’ing boyscout when it comes to preparedness.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Screenshots or it didn't happen!
Yeah, thread got nuked before the rest of us could see it.
Also, gotta love the Munchhausen syndrome kids.
item.content:encoded:
Screenshots or it didn’t happen!

Yeah, thread got nuked before the rest of us could see it.

Also, gotta love the Munchhausen syndrome kids.

item.title: By: bigwig
item.dc:creator: bigwig
item.description: I got to admit, these people are good entertainment. Once, i had a guy create a whole new persona, who was mysteriously never online at the same time, and had contracted some form of rare disease and always seemed to be hospitalized. amazing what people do for attention.
item.content:encoded: I got to admit, these people are good entertainment. Once, i had a guy create a whole new persona, who was mysteriously never online at the same time, and had contracted some form of rare disease and always seemed to be hospitalized. amazing what people do for attention.
